import React from 'react' const products = [ { id: 1, name: 'United World Colleges', href: 'https://www.tj.uwc.org/', description: 'Get the full lineup of our Basic Tees. Have a fresh shirt all week, and an extra for laundry day.', options: '8 colors', imageSrc: './../images/UWCLogo.jpeg', imageAlt: 'Eight shirts arranged on table in black, olive, grey, blue, white, red, mustard, and green.', }, { id: 2, name: 'UCA Graduate Summer School', href: 'https://ucentralasia.org/schools/school-of-professional-and-continuing-education/continuing-education-programme/spce-tajikistan', description: 'Look like a visionary CEO and wear the same black t-shirt every day.', options: 'Black', imageSrc: './../images/UWCLogo.jpeg', imageAlt: 'Front of plain black t-shirt.', }, // More products... ] const HomeScreen = () => { return ( <>

Products

{products.map((product) => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

{product.options}

))}
) } export default HomeScreen
